text: The Orange Suit () is a 2012 Iranian comedy-drama movie directed by Dariush Mehrjui and starring Hamed Behdad, Homayoun Ershadi, Mitra Hajjar, Leila Hatami. ==Other websites== * Category:2012 comedy-drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Dariush Mehrjui
title: The Orange Suit
